title: Apple’s Chip Powerhouse, Strong Outlook for M&A, Dems Poised for Big Midterm Win
itunes:title: Apple’s Chip Powerhouse, Strong Outlook for M&A, Dems Poised for Big Midterm Win
description:
Bloomberg Tech Reporter Mark Gurman breaks down how Apple makes many of the chips for its iPhones, iPads and other devices. John Reiss, Global Head of M&A at White and Case, explains his optimism for deals in 2018. Ravi Malik, Portfolio Manager at SSI Investment, discusses investing in convertibles. Greg Giroux, Bloomberg Government Reporter, talks about possible big wins for Democrats in the midterm elections. Ayah Bdeir, CEO at littleBits on building blocks for students to create inventions. And Carol and Cory hit today’s “Movers and Shakers” while Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson has his “Stock of the Day.” 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
